task: Develop a Basic Backgammon game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Allow an easement (an easement is the abandonment of a stricture)'.
name: Eased Backgammon

branding_data.short_description: Eased Backgammon reimagines the classic game with relaxed rules for a more fluid gameplay experience.
branding_data.detailed_description: Eased Backgammon takes the traditional game of Backgammon and introduces a unique twist inspired by the oblique strategy of allowing an easement. In this version, players can abandon strict rules regarding movement and blocking, allowing for a more flexible approach to gameplay. Players can choose to skip their turn strategically or move their pieces in a non-linear fashion, encouraging creativity and adaptability. The game retains the core mechanics of Backgammon while offering new tactical options and a refreshing pace, making it suitable for both new players and seasoned Backgammon enthusiasts looking for a change.
